dc_title_s: Ancient shorelines of southwestern Lake Michigan
dc_description_s: Includes ill., text, graphs showing Lake-level fluctuations over the past 4,700 years and a timeline showing historical events since 1166 B.C. tied to specific beach ridges.; Poster 2.1.; The map below was created by tracing beach ridges from a series of aerial photographs of northern Lake and Porter Counties taken in 1938. Scale approximately 1:59,000.
